title: Precautionary Boil Water Advisory for Shadow Ridge communal well water users in Greely now lifted ...
text: ( Source : City of Ottawa ) Ottawa - Ottawa Public Health (OPH) has lifted the precautionary boil water advisory affecting approximately 200 users of the Shadow Ridge communal well water system in Greely. Water sample results indicate the
